"foo"
----
type{id: 0, type: "string"}.

2
----
type{id: 0, type: "int"}.

let x = 2 in x
----
type{id: 1, type: "int"}.
type{id: 0, type: "int"}.
type{id: 2, type: "int"}.
scope_item{id: 2, name: "x", type: "int"}.

let x = 2 in toString(plus2(x))
----
type{id: 1, type: "int"}.
type{id: 4, type: "int"}.
scope_item{id: 2, name: "x", type: "int"}.
scope_item{id: 4, name: "x", type: "int"}.
scope_item{id: 3, name: "x", type: "int"}.
